notes.content: Missing asset: /skill-issue.jpg needed for bell curve meme slide (02-the-meme.md). Will be added in CP6 (Polish & Assets).
Reorganized slides to separate the about-me bio from the hook numbers. This creates better pacing - intro yourself briefly, THEN hit them with the dramatic numbers reveal.

Removed the standalone 'solution' slide (05-the-solution.md) as its content is now distributed across the mental model and skills concept slides. The narrative flows better with Question -> Mental Model -> What is a Skill without a separate 'answer' slide.
Added placeholder for skill-issue.jpg in meme slide to prevent build errors. The image asset is still pending for CP6.

Skills deep dive uses a 3-slide approach: (1) How skills work - the flow and file structure, (2) Example skill - Ford's practical setup, (3) Occam's Razor - the right approach to building skills. This keeps the technical content digestible within the 5-7 min allocation.

Vision slide balances optimism with reality check - the 10x myth pushback ensures audience has realistic expectations. Key takeaways slide includes concrete ROI math (4x return) to give decision-makers a business case.

Build complete! Final presentation: 14 slides, 1032 words, 57 v-clicks. Meme slide uses styled placeholder instead of external image (works well). All speaker notes include timing hints. Complete narrative arc verified: Title → Problem → Hook → Question → Mental Model → Skills Concept → How Skills Work → Example → Occam's Razor → Vision → Takeaways → Conclusion.
